short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon SimplifyURL is a Chrome extension that automatically shortens Amazon product page URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension makes URLs simpler, making them easier to share and save.
This tool is particularly convenient for those who frequently use Amazon. 

Installation is easy and no configuration is required.
You can start using it right away.
